reminder_mention: Hey! If you need help, please read the information in <#1074862134284005396> and post your questions or issues in the <#1029543258822553680> channel. Our team and community members are always ready to help you out. Thank you for building with us!
reminder_max_tags: Hey! I can't close/resolve this post it reached max tags. Kindly update this post with approriate and relevant tags and try again.
reminder_close: Hey, this post has been closed due to inactivity, you can still continue if you wish as long as it is relevant to the post. If not, please create a new post for any other questions or concerns.
reminder_resolve: Hey, this post has been marked as resolved, check the pinned message here to see the solution. If you have some other questions kindly create a new post. Happy building!
